DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial compare efficacy safety repaglinide Glurenorm速 Glucobay速 give mono-therapy Chinese subject treatment-naive type 2 diabetic .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Repaglinide , Glurenorm速 Glucobay速 Chinese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes No previous treatment diabetes HbA1c : 7.012.0 % Type 1 diabetes Uncontrolled treated/untreated hypertension Any condition Investigator and/or Sponsor feel would interfere trial participation evaluation result Pregnancy , breastfeeding , intention become pregnant judge use inadequate contraceptive measure ( adequate contraceptive measure : sterilisation , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , oral contraceptive barrier method )
